title: Kraws thisenin mi chak thei lo
lyrics:
Kraws thisenin mi, chak thei lo,
Huai berah a chantir thei;
Kraws thisenin mi huai ber pawh
Tam tak a titlawm der thei.
Kalvari tlang
Chanchin min hriattir ang che.

I thiltihtheihna ka ring e,
I chetzia a mak em em;
Nangma ke hnuaiah Setana
Thihna leh thlan i dah tawh.
Kalvari tlang
Thinlungin theih
nghilh suh se.
